title: Olympus
description: Olympus uses distinct and elegant colors as part of its brand identity. The primary blue (#08107B) symbolizes trust, professionalism, and authority, reinforcing its position in the photography and imaging sector. Complementing this are the vibrant gold (#DFB226), infusing a sense of luxury and premium quality, and a neutral grey (#777777) that balances the palette, adding a sophisticated edge. These colors are recognizable across various platforms and branding materials as part of Olympus's visual identity.
